name: Escape the Ether
description:
Struggle your way through a gauntlet of 100 intense tests of platforming skills, in this ultimate love letter to the platforming and roguelike genres.



  • Infinite possibilities due to the beautifully procedural generation system
  • Use your crystals in a run to help you get further, or save them to purchase permeant skills, upgrades and items to give you an advantage
  • Intense and smooth action due to the unique skills set and feel of the game
  • Secret unlockable missions, bosses and easter eggs
  • Local split screen verses mode
  • LAN multiplayer verses mode
  • Map creator and steam workshop to share the pain



And all this with the use of one hand? Simple to play, impossible to master.
